title: ARE THERE COUNTY ORDINANCES CONCERNING OUT OF CONTROL NUMBERS OF STRAY CATS? IF LANDLORDS ARE REFUSING TO TRAP NEIGHBORHOOD CATS CAN THEY BE CITED.  FINALLY,CAN TENANTS WHO CONTINUALLY FEED STRAY CATS,CAN THEY BE CITED. FEEDING STRAY CATS ONLY INCREASES THE NUMBERS OF CATS RETURNING FOR A FREE MEAL BRINGING FLEES AND TICKS
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=14308
